changelog.text: Task created and started - analyzing memory-bank app.py and Makefile
Identified missing PyYAML dependency - installed PyYAML==6.0.1
Fixed path calculation bug in SpecManager - changed from parent.parent to parent.parent.parent
Successfully ran make slice command - generated 21 slice files from SPEC_RAW.md

decisions: Fixed SpecManager path calculation to use parent.parent.parent instead of parent.parent
Installed missing PyYAML dependency to resolve import error
lessons_learned: The make slice command slices SPEC_RAW.md into individual section files based on numbered headings (## 1. Title)
Each slice file contains YAML frontmatter with metadata including source, range, checksum, headings, and tags
The command clears existing slice files before creating new ones
Path resolution in SpecManager needed to account for the core/manager directory structure
issues_risks: Missing PyYAML dependency caused initial import error
Incorrect path calculation in SpecManager prevented app detection
next_steps: Task completed successfully - make slice command is now working properly
